name: Simulator Za Warudo 0.2
description:
Works on PC and phones

ATTENTION!

If you're playing on PC, then press Z to remove the elements for the phone!

Control:

A, D and space-move, E-stop time, Q-resume time (will resume automatically in newer versions), R-restart game, LMB-knife throw, RMB-create NPC, arrows can be controlled with a second player for fun .
